thread.title: 4 day stay at Spier Wine Farm
thread.title_full: 4 day stay at Spier Wine Farm - Review of Spier Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Zoe D
title: 4 day stay at Spier Wine Farm
text: We really enjoyed our stay at Spier. Plenty to do and see, we loved just wandering around the grounds taking in all the beautiful scenery! Everyone was super friendly and helpful! We especially loved the Hoghouse for great BBQ food and the super comfy beds :) Highly recommend!!
